attributes.action: Disinfect public transport & TFL, to prevent spread of Coronavirus till it ends
attributes.additional_details: This is to protect citizens, residents of the UK, and to keep the UK economy functioning.  The UK Government must take responsibility of disinfecting, sanitizing public places, especially the public transport systems. The private sector should be recommended to disinfect, sanitize private offices, workplaces and estates.
attributes.background: To protect citizens, residents of UK, for UK economy to keep functioning, to prevent spread of Coronavirus (Covid-19), please authorize, order, instruct regular daily disinfection, sanitization program, effective immediately, for public transport systems, particularly London Underground System, TFL.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Responsibility for public transport is devolved to local councils or Mayors.
